common/

ifsf_addpoly2temp.pro


top ifsf_addpoly2temp

IFSFIT

result = ifsf_addpoly2temp(template, nterms=integer, addexp=byte)

Add smooth functions to stellar continuum templates for spectral fitting: polynomials of form x^i (i.e., 1, x, x^2, etc.), their array reversals in wavelength space (i.e., reverse(x), etc.), and optionally 8 exponentials (of form +/-e^-x, +/-e^-2x, +/-e^-4x, +/-e^-8x).

Return value

Array of continuum fitting templates, of type=dblarr(N,M'), with N pixels and M' templates. M' is the number of original templates plus NTERMS polynomials and 8 exponentials (i.e., M' = M + NTERMS + 8).

Parameters

template in required type=dblarr(N,M)

Stellar continuum templates for continuum fitting, with N pixels and M templates.

Keywords

nterms in required type=integer default=3

Use to prevent detailed output to screen. Default is to print detailed output.

addexp in required type=byte default=0

Set to add 8 exponential terms.
